channel.title: Secret Santa
channel.description:
I made a script to pick out the gifters and receivers for the office secret santa.
What is your take? I am interested to see peoples approach.
[code=ruby]def move(array, from, to) array.insert(to, array.delete_at(from)) end
gifters = ['Oliver', 'Paul', 'Rowan', 'Darren', 'Nick', 'Atif', 'Kevin'].shuffle! recievers = gifters.dup
move recievers, recievers.count - 1, 0
p gifters p recievers [/code]

item.title: Secret Santa
item.dc:creator: @mlp311 mlp311
item.description:
@mlp311 wrote:

(let [gifters '("Bob" "Rob" "Job")
       shuffled (shuffle gifters)
       receivers (cons (last shuffled) (butlast shuffled))]
  (println gifters)
  (println receivers))

So

(defn- displace [xs]
  (cons (last xs) (butlast xs)))

Not sure if there’s a library function to achieve the same thing.

EDIT: should be butlast if list/sequence but pop if vector

Read full topic

item.title: Secret Santa
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:5, topic:470008”]But wheres the fun in that Frell?

receivers = ARGV.shuffle!.dup puts Hash[ARGV.zip(receivers << receivers.shift)][/quote]

No time for fun, phaggot.

item.title: Secret Santa
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

looks pretty good and same thing in python:

[code=python]import random

gifters = [‘Oliver’, ‘Paul’, ‘Rowan’, ‘Darren’, ‘Nick’, ‘Atif’, ‘Kevin’]
random.shuffle(gifters)
receivers = gifters[:]
receivers.insert(0, receivers.pop())

print gifters
print receivers[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Secret Santa
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

I made a script to pick out the gifters and receivers for the office secret santa.

What is your take? I am interested to see peoples approach.

[code=ruby]def move(array, from, to)
array.insert(to, array.delete_at(from))
end

gifters = [‘Oliver’, ‘Paul’, ‘Rowan’, ‘Darren’, ‘Nick’, ‘Atif’, ‘Kevin’].shuffle!
recievers = gifters.dup

move recievers, recievers.count - 1, 0

p gifters
p recievers
[/code]

Read full topic
